summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to J Epstein & Co Inc, detailing shipping charges and services provided on various dates in December 2000. It includes information about transportation charges, special handling fees, and delivery details for packages sent from and to the company.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 25, 2000, and includes various shipping charges.
J Epstein & Co Inc is the billing entity for the FedEx services.
Multiple individuals are associated with sending and receiving packages for J Epstein & Co Inc.
The document details specific transportation charges and special handling fees for packages.
There are references to temporary fuel surcharges applied by FedEx.
